import React, {Component, Fragment} from 'react' import PostsList from '../components/PostsList' import Loader from '../Loader' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faAt, faBirthdayCake, faCalendar, faEnvelope, faLink, faMapMarker, faMapMarkerAlt, faUserAlt } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { faEdit } from '@fortawesome/free-regular-svg-icons' import axiosInstance from '../axios' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; class EditProfile extends Component{ constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { account:'', loading: true }; } componentDidMount(){ axiosInstance.get('http://localhost:8000/api/current_user/') .then(res => { this.setState({ account: res.data, loading: false }); }) } formatDate(str){ let date = new Date(str); return date.getFullYear()+'-' + (date.getMonth()+1) + '-'+date.getDate(); } render(){ let status = this.state.account.status ?

{this.state.account.status}

: ''; let location = this.state.account.location ? {this.state.account.location} : ''; let link = this.state.account.link ? | {this.state.account.link} : ''; let birthdate = this.state.account.birthdate ? | {this.formatDate(this.state.account.birthdate)} : ''; let body = this.state.loading ? :
{this.state.account.user.first_name} {this.state.account.user.last_name}
Profile

{this.state.account.user.first_name} {this.state.account.user.last_name}

{this.state.account.user.username}

{this.state.account.user.email}

{this.formatDate(this.state.account.user.date_joined)}

{status}

{location} {link} {birthdate}

{this.state.account.followers.length} followers  |  {this.state.account.following.length} following

Edit profile
Profile
About you
return( {body} ) } } export default EditProfile
